org.spongepowered.api.item.merchant

Interface Merchant

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Carrier, DataHolder, DataSerializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    Villager

    public interface Merchant
extends DataHolder, Carrier
    Represents a Merchant which can offer trades to customers.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Optional<Human> getCustomer()
      Gets the currently trading customer with this merchant.
      TradeOfferData getTradeOfferData()
      Gets a copy of the used TradeOfferData containing all available TradeOffers this Merchant may use.
      void setCustomer(Human human)
      Sets the currently trading customer with this merchant.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.data.DataHolder

        getData, getManipulators, getOrCreate, getProperties, getProperty, isCompatible, offer, offer, remove, setRawData, validateRawData

      • Methods inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.data.DataSerializable

        toContainer

      • Methods inherited from interface org.spongepowered.api.item.inventory.Carrier

        getInventory

    • Method Detail

      • getCustomer

        Optional<Human> getCustomer()
        Gets the currently trading customer with this merchant.
        Returns:
        The currently trading customer if available

      • setCustomer

        void setCustomer(@Nullable
                 Human human)
        Sets the currently trading customer with this merchant.

        If the human entity is available, a new trading window may open with this merchant.

        Parameters:
        human - The human to trade with

      • getTradeOfferData

        TradeOfferData getTradeOfferData()
        Gets a copy of the used TradeOfferData containing all available TradeOffers this Merchant may use.
        Returns:
        A copy of the trade offer data
